LanguageData.VAERoy_EggCraneFertilized.label: crane egg (fert.)
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggCraneFertilized.description: A fertilized crane egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby crane. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggPeacockFertilized.label: peacock egg (fert.)
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggPeacockFertilized.description: A fertilized peacock egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a peacock. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggPheasantFertilized.label: pheasant egg (fert.)
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggPheasantFertilized.description: A fertilized pheasant egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a peacock. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggQuailUnfertilized.label: quail egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggQuailUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized quail egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggQuailFertilized.label: quail egg (fert.)
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggQuailFertilized.description: A fertilized quail egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a quail. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggSwanUnfertilized.label: swan egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggSwanUnfertilized.description: An unfertilized swan egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggSwanFertilized.label: swan egg (fert.)
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggSwanFertilized.description: A fertilized swan egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby swan. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggMegaChickenFertilized.label: megachicken egg (fert.)
LanguageData.VAERoy_EggMegaChickenFertilized.descript: A fertilized megachicken egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a megachicken. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
